name: Ninja Slicer VR(in work)
description:
WHAT IS NINJA SLICER ABOUT?

Ninja Slicer is a game about you, fighting through waves of enemys. You only have one sword. (at some point you will die, earn money and get stronger to get farther). not implemented yet.

At the moment this game is in a test Phase, THEREFOR NOTHING IS FINAL!

if you want to help me playtest the game pleas send me feedback to my e-mail: julian.oettl02@gmail.com

or just write a comment
